text: Robin Lee Miller (October 27, 1949 â€“ August 25, 2021) was an American motorsports journalist and sports commentator. He worked for The Indianapolis Star from 1968 until 2001. He also wrote for Autoweek, Car and Driver, ESPN and Speed. Miller announced he had terminal leukemia in July 2021. He died in Indianapolis from the disease on August 25, 2021 at aged 71.Legendary Racing Journalist Miller Dies at 71 ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from leukemia Category:American sports commentators Category:Journalists from Indiana Category:Writers from Indianapolis Category:People from Anderson, Indiana
title: Robin Miller (journalist)
